summary.span: 为所有 ASP.NET 移动控件类提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all ASP.NET mobile control classes.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为所有 ASP.NET 移动控件的基类, 此类主要包含所有控件共有的样式和上下文信息。As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls. 有关样式和上下文信息的详细信息, 请参阅和类。For more information about style and context information, see the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 由于此类派生自 ASP.NET 基类, 因此所有基类属性、方法和事件都可用于每个移动控件。Because this class derives from the ASP.NET base class, all base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个窗体包含的导航元素激活其他窗体, 而不与服务器交互, 则将其视为链接窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form. 有几个条件可将窗体视为已链接。There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked. 例如, 如果满足以下三个条件, 则窗体 B 被视为链接到窗体 A:For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A: - 窗体 a 包含一个, 其目标为 B 窗体。Form A contains a with its destination as Form B. - 窗体 A 不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 没有事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 基实现不执行任何操作, 但其他控件 (如) 重写默认实现。The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the , override the default implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性不同, 属性不从其父属性继承。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如, 如果在父控件上将属性设置为蓝绿色, 则子控件不会继承蓝绿色的背景色; 必须将子控件的属性显式设置为青色, 或者必须设置父控件并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件 (例如) 可以重写此方法, 以确定它是否是用于提交窗体的控件。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 可以通过提供逻辑来确定是否必须为`submit`控件, 例如通过检查特定属性, 来扩展其他控件。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be `submit` controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > 仅当控件实现捕获回发事件的方法时, 才会将控件视为窗体提交控件。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否则, 即使方法返回`true`, 也不会为默认事件处理程序注册。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件它应执行与它关联的页的每个 HTTP 请求所共有的操作, 如设置数据库查询。This method notifies the server control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with, such as setting up a database query. 在页面生命周期的此阶段中, 将创建并初始化层次结构中的服务器控件, 还原视图状态, 并且窗体控件将反映客户端数据。At this stage in the page lifecycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data. 使用属性可确定是否正在加载页面以响应客户端回发, 或是否首次加载和访问该页面。Use the property to determine whether the page is being loaded in response to a client postback, or if it is being loaded and accessed for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户控件中包含的控件中有 "#form1" 格式的链接, 则此方法将查找用户控件`id=form1`中的窗体。If you have a link of the format "#form1" in a control contained in a user control, this method looks for a form with `id=form1` in the user control. 如果找不到, 它将向上定位任何嵌套用户控件, 然后在页面上搜索窗体。If not found, it goes up the chain of any nested user controls, and then searches for the form on the page. > [!NOTE] > 范围规则将向上 (而不是关闭) 链。Scoping rules walk up, not down, the chain. 如果要浏览到用户控件中包含的窗体, 则必须使用方法使用的 ":" 语法来引用窗体。If you want to browse to a form that is contained in a user control, you must use the ":" syntax used by method to refer to the form.

summary.span: 保存自从持久性存储加载该页以来私有视图状态发生的所有更改。

span.span: Saves any private view-state changes that have occurred since the page was loaded from persistence.

summary.span: 如果未进行任何更改，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If no changes were made, this method returns .

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: An object containing the altered private view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写此方法以存储私有视图状态。You can override this method to store a private view state. 除了与普通视图状态一起保存的信息外, ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体存储信息 (例如是否对窗体进行分页)。In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated. 此添加的信息存储在私有视图状态中, 并存储在客户端而不是服务器上。This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server. 私有视图状态以优化方式保存。A private view state is saved in an optimized manner. 默认行为 (如使第一个窗体成为活动窗体) 从不包含在保存的私有视图状态中。Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.
